summary: Praetorian Guard better Armory Outfit for male and female Imperial Penitus Oculatus (RED Color Version)
descriptionHtml:
Salve Praetorians. This is the Red Color Version. Some users wished to have red instead of Purpur color. Here it is.

This is mainly a texture improvement and has no influence on the standard configuration but only with the details on the imperial special secret service guard (praetorians) called PENITUS OCULATUS.
.No need to replace any Meshes in this version.
Before copying the files I recommend you to \\\\\\\"backup\\\\\\\" the same named files on your extra data-backup folder in case that you perefer to go back to the standard vanilla design textures later on.

Result items improved:
- Armor outfit more roman and more detailed
- Helmet with a dragon engraved (like an original roman cavalry embossing reference)

Easy Installation:

- Replace the single files manually in the named folder structure
- If you do not have a \\\\\\\"generaltulius\\\\\\\" folder already the copy the complete folder
- If you want an extra buckler with scorpio design active ingame them copy also the buckler and the esp filer
- restart the game

Credits:
Thanks to our cool roman expert and french friend which ESP file I may use.

Risks:
All modding changes are used at own risk. But texture changes in general do not have a big risk/effect on the game at all.
Have fun with this addition for a excellent reputation ingame. Feel free to use the Penitus Oculatus stuff for your own avatar.

In various missions you can find the armor, but its to sneak around and to be sassy and take it before someone discover your intensions :-)
If you cannot find the armor ingame its easy to add some via console (cheating)
- Penitus Oculatus Armor ID player.aditem 000D3EA0 1
- Penitus Oculatus Helmet ID player.aditem 000D3EAA 1

Thank you for sharing this and have fun.
VeryFluffy4 for Skyrim Nexus
author: VeryFluffy4
